madness noun [U]
(MENTAL ILLNESS)
offensive a word for mental illness, which was used by doctors in the past but is now offensive: She felt as if she were sliding into madness. Synonyms
insanity
lunacy old-fashionedCompare
mental illness
Add to word list
Add to word list
mental illness: There was a history of madness in her family.
Madness can also refer to behavior that is not reasonable when considering certain situations: It would be sheer madness (= crazy) to ignore the symptoms and do nothing.
